text:
[Verse]
Feet on the pavement
Rain falls all around
Sky is a canvas
We dance without a sound

[Verse 2]
Skip through the puddles
Twirl under the light
Laughter is magic
Echoes in the night

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Caught in a moment's grace
Let the storm embrace
Every drop on my face

[Verse 3]
Moon hides behind clouds
Mystery unfolds
Hearts beat together
As the night grows old

[Bridge]
No words are spoken
Just moving in sync
Lightning strikes above
We don't even blink

[Verse 4]
Hand in hand we move
Rhythm pure and free
Lost but never gone
In this symphony
title: Dancing in the Rain
